faqs.question: What is included in the SaaS Starter Template?
faqs.answer: Our template includes a complete Next.js application with authentication, payment processing, dashboard components, landing pages, email templates, and much more. You get everything you need to launch your SaaS product.

faqs.question: Do I need to pay monthly fees?
faqs.answer: No! This is a one-time purchase with lifetime access. You can build unlimited projects with no recurring fees or restrictions.

faqs.question: Can I customize the design and branding?
faqs.answer: Absolutely! The template is fully customizable. You can easily change colors, fonts, layouts, and add your own branding. We include a comprehensive design system to make customization simple.

faqs.question: What payment methods are supported?
faqs.answer: The template comes with Stripe integration out of the box, supporting credit cards, digital wallets, and international payments. You can also integrate other payment providers if needed.

faqs.question: Is the code production-ready?
faqs.answer: Yes! The code follows industry best practices, includes proper error handling, security measures, and is optimized for production deployment. Many customers have successfully launched with this template.

faqs.question: Do you provide support and updates?
faqs.answer: Yes, we provide regular updates with new features, bug fixes, and security improvements. Support is available via email and our community Discord server.

faqs.question: Can I use this for client projects?
faqs.answer: Yes, you can use this template for both personal and client projects. The license allows commercial use without restrictions.

faqs.question: What if I need help with setup?
faqs.answer: We provide comprehensive documentation, video tutorials, and setup guides. For Enterprise customers, we also offer 1-on-1 setup calls to get you started quickly.
